strongs_def: to name, i.e. assign an appellation; by extension, to utter, mention, profess
outline:
1. to name
    1. to name, to utter, to make mention of the name
    2. to name
      1. give name to, one
      2. be named
        1. to bear the name of a person or thing
      3. to utter the name of a person or thing
